title: 07/15/2021 - HOUR 1 - NBA Finals, Rodgers, Paul

description:
Colin is still picking the Suns to win the NBA Finals

Aaron Rodgers will play this season

What should the Suns do with Chris Paul?


Guest: Ric Bucher
